examples: Engineers collaborate with architects to turn design concepts into reality.

examples: And so that saddens me, saddens me for the people that work there as a businessperson.

examples: Detectives had closed the book on the Hornsey Murders case three years previously.

examples: The farmer employs modern agricultural techniques to maximize the yield of his soybean crop.

examples: Jennifer had been harboring the hots for her gym instructor, Alex.

a sharp talent agent who has a finger in the pie in show business.

he apprenticed himself to the director Max Reinhardt.

examples: 12,000 years later an archeologist is trying to figure who you were.
